content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Common' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (35.0.0)")

content_parts.title: Sage Intacct integration enhancement for customer and supplier data

content_parts.content:
To improve performance, integrating customers and supplier data from Sage Intacct is managed as asynchronous transactions on the Integration page. You can also view error messages, if any.

Customer and supplier data no longer display on the Notification history or the Sage Intacct mapping pages.

To improve usability, additional selection criteria are included for the Stock valuation report and you can further refine the results by excluding any item-site record that does not have a quantity on-hand or value.

The Total stock value displays above the results grid for comparison to the stock account balance in the financial application.

content_parts.title: Bug Fixes
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Common' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND (fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (35.0.0)") OR issueFunction in linkedIssuesOf("issueFunction in x3FindContentsOfImagefixes(\"XT 2023 R4 (35.0.0)\")", "is hotfix of")) AND issue not in (XT-55371,XT-54915,XT-54702,XT-54655,XT-54460,XT-54241,XT-53955)

content_parts.title: Unable to use customize columns on the Stock journal inquiry page

content_parts.content: On the Stock journal inquiry page, you can display or hide columns in the Column panel.

content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Distribution' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (35.0.0)")

content_parts.title: Schedule a mass stock allocation to work orders

content_parts.content: From the Work order mass allocation page, you can schedule a batch task using predefined business rules to reserve component stock in advance of production or to clear stock reserved at a site. Scheduling this task increases time available for higher-value tasks.

Tax updates to support your business needs and improve integration with Sage Intacct include:

Modify tax categories

On the Tax page, you can modify a tax category if it is not assigned to a tax determination rule and if the tax is not in use on a document.

New tax category for Sage Intacct integration

When integrating from Sage Intacct, tax codes are categorized as Placeholder tax.

When you import tax codes with no category defined, they are categorized as Placeholder tax.

For US taxes, you can reassign the category before using the code in a determination rule or document. You can select a city, state, county, or special district tax after the import or integration.

Tax propagation for Order-to-order invoices

Sales order taxes are propagated to the respective sales invoice lines, saving time and ensuring consistency. You only need to determine taxes for sales invoice lines not based on a sales order.

content_parts.title: Mass sales order stock allocation and deallocation

content_parts.content:
From the Sales order mass allocation page, save time when you mass allocate and deallocate stock on sales order lines for all orders or a group of orders at a site. This improves priority management and reduces shortage impacts on strategic customers.

You can schedule allocation and deallocation tasks by creating batch tasks to be run once or on a schedule.

content_parts.title: Improvements
_jql: project = XT AND ((issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Distribution' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = Improvement) OR (issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Distribution' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Behaviour Change' = Yes)) AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (35.0.0)")

content_parts.title: Note propagation when creating purchase documents

content_parts.content:
Save time and improve internal communication and communication with suppliers by repeating notes on purchase documents.
On purchase requisitions, purchase orders, purchase receipts, and purchase invoices, you can repeat the supplier notes on all subsequent documents. You can also repeat the notes at the line level on all subsequent document lines.

content_parts.title: Gross price is set to 0 when applying a default supplier

content_parts.content: For purchase requisitions, the gross price does not set to 0 when you apply a default supplier.

content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Finance' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (35.0.0)")

content_parts.title: Attribute and dimension controls for sales documents

content_parts.content:
To avoid errors with Sage Intacct integration, you can define required attributes and dimensions for sales documents.

When you define required attributes and dimensions, new sales return receipts or sales return requests cannot be created if the required settings are missing or if a GL account is not set up for journal entries for sales return receipts.

content_parts.title: Synchronization errors with Sage Intacct for customers and suppliers

content_parts.content: An error message is no longer displayed when resynchronizing customers and suppliers.

content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Manufacturing' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (35.0.0)")

content_parts.title: Work order tracking: Tracking lines inquiries and tracking grids export

content_parts.content:
You can export tracking data to an Excel or a CSV file from the Production tracking, Material tracking, and Time tracking pages.
The Production tracking line inquiry, Material tracking line inquiry, and Time tracking line inquiry pages provide visibility of tracking data at line level. You can apply filters, export the results, and open the tracking document or work order from the results.

content_parts.title: Include or exclude sales quotes in an MRP calculation request

content_parts.content: You can optionally include sales quotes in the request criteria for an MRP calculation request.

content_parts.content: You can duplicate a routing at a site. The complete sequence of shop floor processes is duplicated, including the operation resources.

content_parts.title: Unsaved changes message in Work in Progress inquiry removed

content_parts.content: The Unsaved changes window is no longer displayed when exiting the Work in progress inquiry page.

content_parts.title: Save button missing from Production tracking

content_parts.content: Stock details added to a Production tracking can be saved.

content_parts.title: Bill of material: Site and base quantity need to be marked as required fields

content_parts.content: You need to enter a Site and a Base quantity on the Bill of material page.

content_parts.title: Work orders: Decreasing the required quantity of fully allocated components

content_parts.content: You can no longer decrease the required quantity of a work order component when stock was allocated to the component in full.

content_parts.title: Adding non-stock item to sales orders

content_parts.content: The ability to save non-stock items is restored.

content_parts.title: Groups removed when filtering a list

content_parts.content: Groups are maintained when you filter the list.

content_parts.title: Item main list: Grouping lost when applying a filter

content_parts.content: Filters can be applied to grouped data.

content_parts.title: Item duplication: Item-site is duplicated but site is empty

content_parts.content: When you duplicate an item that has an item-site page, the item-site is duplicated and displays in the grid as expected.

content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'User experience' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R4 (35.0.0)")

content_parts.content:
When you define multiple filters for a main list, you can remove all filters at once.

Easy access to key actions

For sales and purchasing, you can access document-level actions like Set dimensions, Send, Print, and so on from the More actions menu on a row.

For purchase orders, main list row actions include access to the relevant business action in the document workflow.

content_parts.title: Dashboard enhancements to display more data

content_parts.content: In table widgets, you can add up to 99 columns to view more information at a glance.

content_parts.content: For purchase documents, you can filter on suppliers.

content_parts.title: Duplicate action removed from Sales shipment and Sales return pages

content_parts.content: On the Sales shipment and Sales return pages, the ability to duplicate was removed because it does not apply to these documents.

content_parts.title: Sales shipment: Lines grid status error

content_parts.content: On the Sales shipment page, the error was resolved and the All open status was removed.

content_parts.title: Sales order: Delivery mode available to display on main list

content_parts.content: On the Sales order page, you can display the delivery mode on the main list from the column setting panel.
